md:
giải nghĩa từ "scrape" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Scrape (verb) - cạo, cào, chà, xát
	+ Meaning: to remove something by rubbing or scratching it with a rough or sharp object
	+ Example: She scraped the burnt food off the bottom of the pan.
	+ Related words: scratch, rub, scrape off, scrape away
	+ Antonyms: smooth, polish, clean

* Scrape (noun) - vết trầy, vết xước
	+ Meaning: a mark or injury made by scratching or rubbing something
	+ Example: The scrape on her knee was still sore.
	+ Related words: scratch, cut, wound, bruise
	+ Antonyms: smooth, unblemished, flawless

* Scrape (verb) - kiếm, tìm kiếm
	+ Meaning: to search for and gather something, especially with difficulty or effort
	+ Example: They had to scrape together enough money to pay the rent.
	+ Related words: search, hunt, gather, collect
	+ Antonyms: find easily, have plenty, be wealthy

* Scrape (noun) - khó khăn, gian nan
	+ Meaning: a difficult or unpleasant situation
	+ Example: The company is in a scrape and may have to file for bankruptcy.
	+ Related words: trouble, problem, crisis, predicament
	+ Antonyms: easy, pleasant, comfortable, prosperous
html:
giải nghĩa từ "scrape" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  • Scrape (verb) - cạo, cào, chà, xát

    • Meaning: to remove something by rubbing or scratching it with a rough or sharp object
    • Example: She scraped the burnt food off the bottom of the pan.
    • Related words: scratch, rub, scrape off, scrape away
    • Antonyms: smooth, polish, clean

  • Scrape (noun) - vết trầy, vết xước

    • Example: The scrape on her knee was still sore.
    • Related words: scratch, cut, wound, bruise
    • Antonyms: smooth, unblemished, flawless

  • Scrape (verb) - kiếm, tìm kiếm

    • Meaning: to search for and gather something, especially with difficulty or effort
    • Example: They had to scrape together enough money to pay the rent.
    • Related words: search, hunt, gather, collect
    • Antonyms: find easily, have plenty, be wealthy

  • Scrape (noun) - khó khăn, gian nan

    • Meaning: a difficult or unpleasant situation
    • Example: The company is in a scrape and may have to file for bankruptcy.
    • Related words: trouble, problem, crisis, predicament
    • Antonyms: easy, pleasant, comfortable, prosperous
